text: Below there are several questions. To answer them, drag each tile by its 6 dots into your workspace. Once in your workspace, the tiles will become editable.

1. Review the handout corresponding to the challenge you have chosen in your group.

Challenge A

Challenge B

tiles.title: 2. Build Your App Here: Build an app that will help Kenia solve the challenge you have chosen

text:
3. Write detailed modeling memos of your process.

{Write your answer here}

4. Bonus Task: You should only work on the bonus task corresponding to the challenge you have chosen.

Challenge A

Cory cats, Gouramis, and Loaches are three compatible species that Kenia wants to put together in an exhibit in her aquarium. She knows that Cory cats can grow up to 3 inches, Gouramis can grow up to 28 inches, and Loaches can grow up to 8 inches. If Kenia gets 80 cory cats, 50 Gouramis, and 70 Loaches all as babies, what size tank will she need?

Challenge B

Kenia’s friend, Jie, also lives in Cambridge and works in Concord. Jie is considering moving to Worcester, Marlborough, or Chelmsford, which are popular and cheaper places for people who work in Concord to live. Based on what you can find about these places, and your app, should Jie move to one of these places?

5. Write a letter or design a poster/brochure that presents your work to Kenia. Your goal is to convince Kenia to choose your app using strong facts and evidence. Feel free to reference specific parts of your modeling memos as part of your evidence.

{Write your answer here}
6. From your portal, launch Lesson 5: Individual Work
